SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into videoinfo (title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, userId) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{praisenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avgscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{istop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update videoinfo set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pictureurl = #{pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urls = #{urls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, praiseNum = #{praisenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readNum = #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commentNum = #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avgscore = #{avgscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creatStamp = #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, isTop = #{istop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where videoID = #{videoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select videoID, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, userId from videoinfo where videoID = #{videoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select videoID, title, pictureurl, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop, userId from videoinfo
